ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols

Class OutputToPiPwm

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.protocols.OutputToPiPwm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPinOut

    public class OutputToPiPwm
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPinOut
    Manage Pulse Width Moduleted (PWM) Output to Rasperry PI to drive Servos and Coreless Motors. The default frequency is 50 HZ. We expect to manage input values between -1.0 and 1.0 where 0.0 is the neutral position.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
